text:
Beware scam email about Covid vaccine 
The NHS will NEVER ask for:
❌ your bank account or card details
❌ your pin or banking password
❌ copies of personal documents to prove your identity https://t.co/kHOxI5eG6h
 https://t.co/9pq4qUS3tD #SCAM   #vaccine #COVID19 #Advocacyworks https://t.co/YXe3PMJM6q
